ConfigManager

ConfigManager Class

class src.utilities.config_manager.ConfigManager

Bases: object

static generate_argparse_from_options() → ArgumentParser

Generate an ArgumentParser based on the Options dataclass.

Returns:

argparse.ArgumentParser – Argument parser object.

Example

>>> parser = ConfigManager.generate_argparse_from_options()
>>> args = parser.parse_args(['--synthesis_parameters_max_depth', '6'])
>>> print(args.synthesis_parameters_max_depth)
6
static get_config() → Options

Get the final configuration by merging defaults, YAML config, and CLI args.

Returns:

Options – Final merged configuration as Options dataclass.

static load_yaml(file_path: str) → Dict[str, Any]

Load configuration from a YAML file.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – Path to the YAML configuration file.

Returns:

Dict[str, Any] – Configuration as a dictionary.

Raises:

  • FileNotFoundError – If the config file doesn’t exist.

  • yaml.YAMLError – If there’s an error parsing the YAML file.

static merge_config(default_options: Options, yaml_config: Dict[str, Any] | None, cli_args: Namespace) → Options

Merge default options with any user defined YAML config and CLI arguments. CLI arguments will take priority over any user defined config in the user_config.yaml file.

Parameters:

  • default_options (Options) – Default options from the Options dataclass.

  • yaml_config (Optional[Dict[str, Any]]) – Configuration loaded from YAML file.

  • cli_args (argparse.Namespace) – Parsed command-line arguments.

Returns:

Options – Merged configuration as Options dataclass.

Options Class

class src.utilities.options.Options(logging_level: str = 'INFO', logging_file: str = 'logs/default.log', synthesis_parameters_strategy: str = 'random_enumerative', synthesis_parameters_max_iterations: int = 500, synthesis_parameters_max_depth: int = 5, synthesis_parameters_max_complexity: int = 5, synthesis_parameters_random_seed: int = 1234, synthesis_parameters_randomise_each_iteration: bool = False, synthesis_parameters_max_candidates_at_each_depth: int = 10, synthesis_parameters_min_const: int = -2, synthesis_parameters_max_const: int = 2, solver_name: str = 'z3', solver_timeout: int = 30000)

Bases: object

Options for configuring the Synthesis process.

logging_level

Logging level. Choices are DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL. Default is INFO.

Type:

str

logging_file

Log file path. Default is logs/default.log.

Type:

str

synthesis_parameters_strategy

Synthesis strategy. Choices are random_enumerative, fast_enumerative. Default is random_enumerative.

Type:

str

synthesis_parameters_max_iterations

Maximum number of iterations. Default is 500.

Type:

int

synthesis_parameters_max_depth

Maximum depth of generated expressions. Default is 5.

Type:

int

synthesis_parameters_max_complexity

Maximum complexity of generated expressions. Default is 5.

Type:

int

synthesis_parameters_random_seed

Random seed for all solvers. Default is 1234.

Type:

int

synthesis_parameters_randomise_each_iteration

Randomise seed between each synthesis iteration. Default is False.

Type:

bool

synthesis_parameters_max_candidates_at_each_depth

Maximum number of candidate programs to consider at each depth. Default is 10.

Type:

int

synthesis_parameters_min_const

Minimum constant to introduce into the candidate programs. Default is -2.

Type:

int

synthesis_parameters_max_const

Maximum constant to introduce into the candidate programs. Default is 2.

Type:

int

solver_name

SMT Solver to use. Choices are z3, cvc5. Default is z3.

Type:

str

solver_timeout

SMT Solver Configuration - Timeout. Default is 30000.

Type:

int
